title: Respond to a Reader's Story Correction Request
description: A reader has emailed to point out a factual error in a published article. An editor must investigate and, if necessary, issue a correction.

tasks.description: Review the reader's email and identify the specific error they are reporting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the nature of the potential error.

tasks.description: Re-check the reporter's original notes and sources to verify the reader's claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines that the reader is correct and the article contains an error.

tasks.description: Update the online article with the correct information and add a formal correction notice at the bottom of the story.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is corrected and a transparent notice is added.

tasks.description: Reply to the reader's email, thanking them for pointing out the error and informing them that it has been corrected.
tasks.expected_outcome: A polite and professional response is sent to the reader.
